entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT, Kangiqsujuaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:09 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.9°C

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 6.
